title: Larry Kudlow
summary: Lawrence Alan Kudlow (born August 20, 1947) is an American conservative television personality and financial program host for Fox network who served as the Director of the National Economic Council during the Trump Administration from 2018 to 2021. He assumed that role after his previous employment as a CNBC television financial news host.[1][2] He held a corporate title of "economist" in the 1980s, though he is not formally educated in economics.
